message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product. I think it would be incredibly valuable for you. I'm asking for $9,500. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only willing to pay up to $8,000. Could we meet in the middle?
I understand your position, Bob.  While I'm confident this product is worth far more than $8,000 to you, I'm willing to come down a bit.  How about $9,000?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate further. I'm still committed to staying within my budget. Would $8,500 be acceptable for you?
